casebody.data:
Fawzy MOHAMED, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
BRENNER OIL COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159383
COA: 341899 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 20, 2019.
